# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a valuable asset. I'm extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $150, a special offer considering its market value of $120. This deal won't last long, so I hope you'll find this offer compelling. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
